short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dark-themed Firefox/Chrome Extension that adds additional features and gives an overall better experience for SEQTA Learn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This project is no longer actively being maintained, so there will be limited updates to the extension. The extension will still be available to download and will still work as intended for the foreseeable future.

Key Features:
     • Dark mode
     • Custom Themes
     • Options to remove and reorder any items from the side menu
     • Notification for next lesson
     • Browser Support
Improved Styling/CSS
     • Improved look for SEQTA Learn
Custom Home Page including:
     • Daily Lessons
     • Shortcuts
     • Easier Access Notices

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/Nulkem/betterseqta

Disclaimer: This extension is not owned, operated or associated with the company Education Horizons.
